reason: Misleading question: implies 동반휴직 is applied 'within' 가족돌봄휴직 but they are separate independent leave types (자. vs 차. on page 144). Duplicate answer content with q_3_0646.
Duplicate answer (identical content to q_3_0648). Same source text, same page, nearly identical answer covering 가족돌봄휴직 + 동반휴직 together.
Duplicate answer (same content as q_3_0648/0649). Question asks about '필수 확인 사항' (essential check items) for admin processing but answer is generic overview, not an admin checklist.
Specific question about 직무연수 requirement on 동반휴직 복직. Answer accurately reflects p145 source: 2년이상 휴직시 직무연수 필요, 30일내 복귀신고시 당연복직, 경력평정/호봉승급/보수 정보 all verified.
Specific question about 노조전임자휴직 인정 cases. Answer accurately covers 근거(제44조제1항제11호), 휴직사유, 대상, 기간(전임기간), 신청절차 all matching p145 source.
Specific question about early return from 노조전임자휴직. Answer accurately states: 원칙적 불가, exceptions (허가취소/임용권자 허가), 복직원 제출 절차 all matching p145 lines 48-49.
Hallucination: source only says '6월 이상 휴직 시 별도정원에 의한 결원보충' but answer fabricates details not in source: 기간제교원 임용, 교육공무원임용령 reference, 임용기간 결정 방법 등.
Bad question: tautological - '휴직기간 및 횟수에 관한 기간과 횟수를 알려주세요' asks about 'period and frequency of period and frequency.' Redundant/nonsensical phrasing.
Grammar error: '횟수과' should be '횟수와' (batchim particle mismatch). Question topic '학교 행정실에서 처리하는 업무' not in source - source makes no mention of school admin office duties.
Source mismatch: question asks about 노조전임자휴직 but answer's first half is 동반휴직 content (경력평정, 호봉승급, 보수, 결원보충). Source text starts with 동반휴직 section 6)-8) and only reaches 노조전임자휴직 at the very end.
